title: Bloomberg Markets: Guadagno Says Stop Treating All Data Equally

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Norman Guadagno\u0010Chief Evangelist\u0010Carbonite \u0010Discussing the Equifax breach and the cyber threat to marketing firms.
